page.title: 18SPORTS' CLUBS IN HENFIELD.
page.content: There is plenty to do if you are a Sportsperson in Henfield. There is the Cricket Club, Bowls Club, the Memorial Sports Ground (this is the Village Memorial to the dead of World War 2) the King's Field with a Tennis Club on it and the Rothery Field for football. In the Village Hall is held Badminton, Judo and Gym Clubs. Sports' Club by Joseph. I belong to Henfield Boys' Sports' Club which does things like football and cricket. I am in the under 10s team. It is good fun practising tactics and skills. We practice at the Rothery and the King's Field. We play in a mini-minor league and play home and away matches. It is good fun. Judo by Debbie. I go to Judo classes every Tuesday. There are 3 groups.We pay 60p.We work hard and practice deadly exercises!
